a
"0010000110000010" --getRX
"0001011011000000" --setDataIn
"0001000011000010" -- sqrt
"0000011001000000" --wait
"0100000011100000" -- IO outport
b
"0010000110000010" -- getRX
"0011010110100011" -- set period
"0010000110000010" --getRX
"0011011010100100" --set DC
"0011000110100010" --timer up start
c
"0100001011100010" --uart temp
"0100000011100000" --uart outport
